fixtures.title: Baseline QuickTime sample
fixtures.description: Apple sample MP4 containing baseline H.264 video and AAC audio, used for parser smoke tests.

fixtures.title: Fragmented stream initialization segment
fixtures.description: Synthetic init segment carrying ftyp/moov boxes to drive fragmented playback flows.

fixtures.title: DASH media segment sample
fixtures.description: Synthetic DASH media segment carrying styp/sidx/moof/mdat for streaming validation.

fixtures.title: Fragment with multiple track runs
fixtures.description: Synthetic moof carrying two trun boxes with composition offsets to stress run aggregation.

warnings: Contains multiple trun runs with version 0 composition offsets

fixtures.title: Fragment with negative data offset
fixtures.description: Synthetic fragment exercising negative trun data_offset handling and signed composition offsets.

fixtures.title: Fragment without decode time box
fixtures.description: Synthetic fragment omitting tfdt so decode times and presentation offsets fall back to defaults.

warnings: Track fragment omits tfdt; decode times default to context state

fixtures.title: Large mdat stress sample
fixtures.description: Synthetic MP4 with 8 KiB media payload to exercise large mdat handling and large-size headers.

fixtures.title: Malformed truncated moov sample
fixtures.description: MP4 stub where the declared moov size exceeds available payload to trigger truncation handling.

fixtures.title: Edit list with no entries
fixtures.description: Synthetic track containing an empty edit list to exercise VR-014 duration reconciliation when no edits are declared.

warnings: Track 1 edit list spans 0 movie ticks but movie header duration is 1200 (short by 1200 > 1 tick).
Track 1 edit list spans 0 movie ticks but track header duration is 900 (short by 900 > 1 tick).
Track 1 edit list consumes 0 media ticks but media duration is 96000 (short by 96000 > 1 tick).

fixtures.title: Edit list with initial empty edit and offset
fixtures.description: Synthetic track containing an initial empty edit followed by an offset segment to surface VR-014 media duration diagnostics.

warnings: Track 2 edit list consumes 62400 media ticks but media duration is 64000 (short by 1600 > 1 tick).

fixtures.title: Edit list with multiple segments exceeding durations
fixtures.description: Synthetic track containing multiple contiguous edit list segments to exercise VR-014 overage warnings for movie and track durations.

warnings: Track 3 edit list spans 1200 movie ticks but movie header duration is 1000 (over by 200 > 1 tick).
Track 3 edit list spans 1200 movie ticks but track header duration is 950 (over by 250 > 1 tick).

fixtures.title: Edit list with unsupported playback rates
fixtures.description: Synthetic track containing negative, accelerated, and fractional rate edits to exercise VR-014 playback rate diagnostics.

warnings: Track 4 edit list entry 0 uses media_rate_integer=-1; reverse playback is unsupported.
Track 4 edit list entry 1 uses media_rate_integer=2; playback rate adjustments above 1x are unsupported.
Track 4 edit list entry 2 sets media_rate_fraction=1; fractional playback rates are unsupported.
